title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
instructors: To be determined from FutureLearn course page
learning_outcomes: Understand Earth's physical geography and apply this knowledge to protect the natural environment. Learn about sustainability and environmental challenges facing the planet.

title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
learning_outcomes: Understand Earth's physical geography and apply this knowledge to environmental protection. Learn about sustainable practices and contribute to preserving our natural environment for future generations.

title: Intermediate German: Countries and Landscapes
description: Examine the human and physical geography of German-speaking countries and the language used to discuss them.
skills: Vocabulary related to geography and countries
learning_outcomes: Understand and discuss the human and physical geography of German-speaking countries. Improve vocabulary related to countries and landscapes. Enhance German language skills in a specific context.

title: Intermediate French: People and Places
description: Gain an introduction to the physical and human geography of France and explore the language used to speak about them.
prerequisites: Basic French language skills (e.g., beginner French course or equivalent)
learning_outcomes: Understand and use French to discuss the physical and human geography of France. Improve vocabulary related to places and people. Develop cultural awareness of French-speaking regions.
